Action Input: {"answer": "Here are the latest sports headlines from 'Football Italia':

1. 'Official: Fiorentina appoint Gattuso': Fiorentina have officially announced Gennaro Gattuso as their new head coach at the Artemio Franchi. [Read more](http://www.football-italia.net/node/171174)

2. 'Official: De Zerbi new Shakhtar Donetsk coach': Roberto De Zerbi has officially been appointed as the new coach of Shakhtar Donetsk on a two-year contract after leaving Sassuolo. [Read more](http://www.football-italia.net/node/171176)

3. 'Maignan will sign five-year deal with Milan': Milan have reportedly prepared a five-year deal for Mike Maignan worth €2.5m a season plus bonuses. [Read more](http://www.football-italia.net/node/171173)

4. 'Gattuso salutes Napoli fans': Just before he was announced as the new Fiorentina coach, Gennaro Gattuso wrote an open letter saluting Napoli fans. [Read more](http://www.football-italia.net/171175/gattuso-salutes-napoli-fans)

5. 'Gervinho and Bruno Peres to Trabzonspor': Trabzonspor have reportedly secured deals with Bruno Peres and Gervinho, who leaves Serie A on free transfers. [Read more](http://www.football-italia.net/171172/gervinho-and-bruno-peres-trabzonspor)

6. 'Fiorentina prepare two-year deal for Gattuso?': Fiorentina are reportedly prepared to offer Gennaro Gattuso a two-year deal, but Lazio are still being linked with the Calabrian coach. [Read more](http://www.football-italia.net/171171/fiorentina-prepare-two-year-deal-gattuso)"}
